title: "Quite Moving To See Him Stand Up": Trump Shooting Witness To NDTV
content: Jason Vechhio, who was 150 steps away from the stage, said that it was a very positive experience until the former president was shot and then a kind of "confusion and fear set in".
summary: Jason Vechhio, who was 150 steps away from the stage, said that it was a very positive experience until the former president was shot and then a kind of "confusion and fear set in".

title: 100 Injured As Bangladesh Students Clash In Job Quota Protests
content: More than 100 students were injured across Bangladesh on Monday in clashes between those protesting to end a quota system for government jobs and others loyal to the ruling party, police and witnesses said.
summary: More than 100 students were injured across Bangladesh on Monday in clashes between those protesting to end a quota system for government jobs and others loyal to the ruling party, police and witnesses said.

title: Windfall Tax On Crude Petroleum Hiked To Rs 7,000 Per Tonne
content: The government on Monday hiked the windfall tax on domestically produced crude oil to Rs 7,000 per tonne, from Rs 6,000 per tonne.
summary: The government on Monday hiked the windfall tax on domestically produced crude oil to Rs 7,000 per tonne, from Rs 6,000 per tonne.

title: Apple Shares Reach Record High After Morgan Stanley's "Top Pick" Comment
content: Apple's shares rose 2.5% to a record high on Monday after Morgan Stanley raised its price target on the iPhone maker's shares and designated the stock as a "top pick," citing the company's AI efforts as a boost to device sales.
summary: Apple's shares rose 2.5% to a record high on Monday after Morgan Stanley raised its price target on the iPhone maker's shares and designated the stock as a "top pick," citing the company's AI efforts as a boost to device sales.

title: Cave Found On Moon, Could Shelter Humans In Future
content: Scientists have found evidence for an accessible cave conduit beneath the moon's surface. The location of the underground cave is not far from Apollo 11's landing site.
summary: Scientists have found evidence for an accessible cave conduit beneath the moon's surface. The location of the underground cave is not far from Apollo 11's landing site.

title: Man Who Killed 42 Women In 2 Years Arrested As He Watched Euro Finals
content: Acting Inspector General of Police Douglas Kanja said the 33-year-old suspect, named as Collins Jumaisi Khalusha, was arrested at around 3:00 am (0000 GMT) near a Nairobi bar where he had been watching the Euro 2024 football final.
summary: Acting Inspector General of Police Douglas Kanja said the 33-year-old suspect, named as Collins Jumaisi Khalusha, was arrested at around 3:00 am (0000 GMT) near a Nairobi bar where he had been watching the Euro 2024 football final.

title: Nearly 40 Killed, 230 Injured After Heavy Rainfall In Eastern Afghanistan
content: At least 35 people were killed and 230 injured on Monday after heavy rain in eastern Afghanistan, a local official said.
summary: At least 35 people were killed and 230 injured on Monday after heavy rain in eastern Afghanistan, a local official said.

title: Serum Institute's New "High Efficacy" Malaria Vaccine Rolls Out In Africa
content: A new "high efficacy" malaria vaccine co-developed by the Serum Institute of India (SII) and the University of Oxford was officially rolled out on Monday when Cote d'Ivoire in West Africa became the first country to begin administering R21/Matrix-M.
summary: A new "high efficacy" malaria vaccine co-developed by the Serum Institute of India (SII) and the University of Oxford was officially rolled out on Monday when Cote d'Ivoire in West Africa became the first country to begin administering R21/Matrix-M.

title: US Secret Service Vows To Cooperate With Review After Trump Rally Shooting
content: Under growing pressure for a massive security failure, the US Secret Service on Monday vowed to cooperate with an independent review after a shooter was allowed to open fire on Donald Trump.
summary: Under growing pressure for a massive security failure, the US Secret Service on Monday vowed to cooperate with an independent review after a shooter was allowed to open fire on Donald Trump.

title: Romania Approves Culling Of Nearly 500 Bears After Deadly Hiker Attack
content: Romania's parliament on Monday approved the culling of almost 500 bears this year in a bid to control the protected species' "overpopulation" after a deadly hiker attack sparked nationwide outcry.
summary: Romania's parliament on Monday approved the culling of almost 500 bears this year in a bid to control the protected species' "overpopulation" after a deadly hiker attack sparked nationwide outcry.

title: Donald Trump's Classified Documents Case Dismissed By Florida Judge
content: A Florida judge appointed by Donald Trump has dismissed the criminal case against the former president on charges of mishandling top secret documents, saying the way that Special Counsel Jack Smith was appointed was improper.
summary: A Florida judge appointed by Donald Trump has dismissed the criminal case against the former president on charges of mishandling top secret documents, saying the way that Special Counsel Jack Smith was appointed was improper.

title: Russia Should Attend Second Ukraine Summit, Says Zelensky Amid Raging War
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said Monday that Russia should be represented at a second summit aiming to secure lasting peace with the Kremlin, after more than two years of war.
summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said Monday that Russia should be represented at a second summit aiming to secure lasting peace with the Kremlin, after more than two years of war.

title: Ex Pakistan Foreign Minister Indicted In May 9 Violence Case
content: An anti-terrorism court here on Monday charged top Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf leader and former foreign minister Shah Mahmood Qureshi in a case involving the burning down of a police station during the May 9 violence last year.
summary: An anti-terrorism court here on Monday charged top Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf leader and former foreign minister Shah Mahmood Qureshi in a case involving the burning down of a police station during the May 9 violence last year.

title: Fight Against Terrorism, Separatism, Extremism SCO's Priority: S Jaishankar
content: Stating that terrorism is a major challenge faced by the world today, External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar said that the Shanghai Cooperation Organization (SCO) has to play a major role in the region's security.
summary: Stating that terrorism is a major challenge faced by the world today, External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar said that the Shanghai Cooperation Organization (SCO) has to play a major role in the region's security.

title: Not Worried About Another Trump Presidency, We Will Work Together: Zelensky
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky on Monday said he was not concerned at the prospect of another Donald Trump presidency in the United States, despite indications his administration could be more sympathetic to the Kremlin.
summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky on Monday said he was not concerned at the prospect of another Donald Trump presidency in the United States, despite indications his administration could be more sympathetic to the Kremlin.

title: Scientists Decode 125-Year-Old Element That Could Improve Cancer Treatments
content: US researchers have decoded an element that could destroy cancerous cells, and advance treatment options for the deadly disease that claims millions of lives globally.
summary: US researchers have decoded an element that could destroy cancerous cells, and advance treatment options for the deadly disease that claims millions of lives globally.

title: "Committed To Strengthen Nepal-India Relations": Newly Appointed PM
content: Newly appointed Nepalese Prime Minister KP Sharma Oli on Monday said he was committed to working with his Indian counterpart Narendra Modi on strengthening Nepal-India relations and elevating the bilateral ties to new heights.
summary: Newly appointed Nepalese Prime Minister KP Sharma Oli on Monday said he was committed to working with his Indian counterpart Narendra Modi on strengthening Nepal-India relations and elevating the bilateral ties to new heights.

title: England, Wales Population Rises By Most Since 1948 After Record Immigration
content: Record immigration caused the population of England and Wales to rise by 610,000 to 60.9 million in mid-2023, the largest annual increase in 75 years, official data showed on Monday.
summary: Record immigration caused the population of England and Wales to rise by 610,000 to 60.9 million in mid-2023, the largest annual increase in 75 years, official data showed on Monday.

title: AI Improves Creativity In Stories, Reduces Diversity: Study
content: Stories created with help of ChatGPT are more creative compared to those by writers not using the tool, according to research. However, diversity in stories suffered with the use of AI.
summary: Stories created with help of ChatGPT are more creative compared to those by writers not using the tool, according to research. However, diversity in stories suffered with the use of AI.

title: Video - "Officer! Officer!": Trump Supporters On Seeing Shooter On Roof
content: The US Secret Service is under fire over its most stunning failure in decades following the assassination attempt on Trump and witnesses claiming they had flagged the shooter to the officials before he took the shot are only adding to the crisis.
summary: The US Secret Service is under fire over its most stunning failure in decades following the assassination attempt on Trump and witnesses claiming they had flagged the shooter to the officials before he took the shot are only adding to the crisis.
